1.name: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
1.description: A group of motorists hear about a crook's hidden stash of loot, and race against each other across the country to get to it.

2.name: The Birds
2.description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

3.name: The Great Escape
3.description: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

4.name: From Russia with Love
4.description: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination plot involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E.

5.name: Cleopatra
5.description: Queen Cleopatra of Egypt experiences both triumph and tragedy as she attempts to resist the imperial ambitions of Rome.

6.name: 8½
6.description: A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

7.name: Charade
7.description: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

8.name: PT 109
8.description: During WW2, Lieut. John F. Kennedy takes command of PT 109 to fight the Japanese in the Solomon Islands.

9.name: What a Crazy World
9.description: Unemployed East End lad Alf Hitchens has an on-off relationship with his girlfriend Marilyn and a dream of hitting the big time in the music business. Cheerful pop musical with a ...                See full summary »

10.name: The Pink Panther
10.description: The bumbling Inspector Clouseau travels to Rome to catch a notorious jewel thief known as "The Phantom" before he conducts his most daring heist yet: a princess' priceless diamond with one slight imperfection, known as "The Pink Panther".

11.name: Donovan's Reef
11.description: Comedy subtly dealing with moral issues such as racial bigotry, corporate greed, American belief of societal superiority and hypocrisy.

12.name: Lord of the Flies
12.description: Lost on an island, young survivors of a plane crash eventually revert to savagery despite the few rational boys' attempts to prevent that.

13.name: McLintock!
13.description: Wealthy rancher G.W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

14.name: Ieri oggi domani
14.description: Stories about three very different women and the men they attract.

15.name: Jason and the Argonauts
15.description: The legendary Greek hero leads a team of intrepid adventurers in a perilous quest for the legendary Golden Fleece.

16.name: Le mépris
16.description: Screenwriter Paul Javal's marriage to his wife Camille disintegrates during movie production as she spends time with the producer. Layered conflicts between art and business ensue.

17.name: The Sword in the Stone
17.description: A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.

18.name: Il gattopardo
18.description: The Prince of Salina, a noble aristocrat of impeccable integrity, tries to preserve his family and class amid the tumultuous social upheavals of 1860's Sicily.

19.name: Fun in Acapulco
19.description: Mike works on a boat in Acapulco. When the bratty daughter of the boat owner gets him fired, Mike must find new work. Little boy Rauol helps him get a job as a lifeguard and singer at a ...                See full summary »

20.name: Bye Bye Birdie
20.description: A rock singer travels to a small Ohio town to make his "farewell" television performance and kiss his biggest fan before he is drafted.

21.name: The Haunting
21.description: A scientist doing research on the paranormal invites two women to a haunted mansion. One of the participants soon starts losing her mind.

22.name: Beach Party
22.description: "Beach Party" was the first of of a series of seven related AIP beach party films. The others are Muscle Beach Party, Bikini Beach, Pajama Party, Beach Blanket Bingo, How to Stuff a Wild Bikini and The Ghost in the Invisible Bikini.

23.name: Tom Jones
23.description: The romantic and chivalrous adventures of adopted bastard Tom Jones in 18th century England.

24.name: Irma la Douce
24.description: In Paris, a former policeman falls in love with a prostitute, and tries to get her out of that life by paying for all of her time.

25.name: Hud
25.description: Honest and hard-working Texas rancher Homer Bannon has a conflict with his unscrupulous, selfish, arrogant and egotistical son Hud, who sank into alcoholism after accidentally killing his brother in a car crash.

26.name: Tystnaden
26.description: Two estranged sisters, Ester and Anna, and Anna's 10-year-old son travel to the Central European country on the verge of war. Ester becomes seriously ill and the three of them move into a hotel in a small town called Timoka.

27.name: Move Over, Darling
27.description: After five years lost at sea, a missing wife thought long dead returns just after her husband remarries.

28.name: Tengoku to jigoku
28.description: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

29.name: The Nutty Professor
29.description: To improve his social life, a nerdish professor drinks a potion that temporarily turns him into the handsome, but obnoxious, Buddy Love.

30.name: This Sporting Life
30.description: Despite success on the field, a rising rugby star senses the emerging emptiness of his life as his inner angst begins to materialize through aggression and brutality, so he attempts to woo his landlady in hopes of finding reason to live.

31.name: The Servant
31.description: Upper-class Tony (James Fox) hires servant Hugo Barrett (Sir Dirk Bogarde), who turns out to have a hidden agenda.

32.name: Lilies of the Field
32.description: A travelling handyman becomes the answer to the prayers of nuns who wish to build a chapel in the desert.

33.name: Shock Corridor
33.description: Bent on winning a Pulitzer Prize, a journalist commits himself to a mental institution to solve a strange and unclear murder.

34.name: The Courtship of Eddie's Father
34.description: Eddie thinks it is time for his father to remarry. However, in his opinion his father's taste in women leaves much to be desired. He believes the girl next door would be a far better choice...

35.name: I tre volti della paura
35.description: Boris Karloff hosts a trio of horror stories concerning a stalked call girl, a vampire-like monster who preys on his family, and a nurse who is haunted by her ring's rightful owner.

36.name: The List of Adrian Messenger
36.description: A former intelligence officer is tasked by the heir to the Gleneyre estate to investigate the unusual deaths of a disparate group of eleven men on a list.

37.name: The Day of the Triffids
37.description: After an unusual meteor shower leaves most of the human population blind, a merchant navy officer must find a way to conquer tall, aggressive plants which are feeding on people and animals.

38.name: Summer Magic
38.description: A Bostonian widow moves with her kids to the country.

39.name: The Terror
39.description: A young officer in Napoleon's Army pursues a mysterious woman to the castle of an elderly Baron.

40.name: Nattvardsgästerna
40.description: A small town priest struggles with his faith.

41.name: The Thrill of It All
41.description: A housewife's sudden rise to fame as a soap spokesperson leads to chaos in her home life.

42.name: X
42.description: A doctor uses special eye drops to give himself x-ray vision, but the new power has disastrous consequences.

43.name: The Cardinal
43.description: A young Catholic priest from Boston confronts bigotry, Naziism, and his own personal conflicts as he rises to the office of cardinal.

44.name: Love with the Proper Stranger
44.description: Angie Rossini is an innocent Italian Catholic Macy's salesgirl, who discovers she's pregnant from a fling with Rocky, a musician. Angie finds Rocky (who doesn't remember her at first) to ...                See full summary »

45.name: Dementia 13
45.description: A scheming widow hatches a daring plan to get her hands on her late husband's inheritance, unbeknownst to her that she is targeted by an axe-wielding murderer who lurks within the family's estate.

46.name: The Raven
46.description: A magician, who has been turned into a raven, turns to a former sorcerer for help.

47.name: 55 Days at Peking
47.description: During the 1900 Boxer Rebellion against foreigners in China, U.S. Marine Major Matt Lewis, aided by British Consul Sir Arthur Robertson, devises a strategy to keep the rebels at bay until an international military relief force arrives.

48.name: Palm Springs Weekend
48.description: Set in Palm Springs, California during a long, fun-filled weekend where several Los Angeles college students flock to spring break, centering on Jim who finds romance with Bunny, the ...                See full summary »

49.name: The Incredible Journey
49.description: The story of three pets, a cat and two dogs, who lose their owners when they are all on vacation. Can they find their way home?

50.name: Blood Feast
50.description: An Egyptian caterer kills various women in suburban Miami to use their body parts to bring to life a dormant Egyptian goddess, while an inept police detective tries to track him down.
